title: Plastics into the future
creator_credit: Shane Mulcahy, Bruce Shearer and Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
brief_description: Peter Couchman discusses with Bob Leschen of the Plastics Institute of Australia about the definition, application, types, manufacture and acceptance of plastics in everyday use.
